hackathon-description-text: WarwickTECH presents  to you MLH 2017 Spring Season's WarwickHACK 2017 – our 3rd annual flagship hackathon!
hackathon-eligibility:
18+ Years
Students only
Up to 4 participants per team
hackathon-requirements:
Your submissions will be judged based on what you submit here on Devpost as well as your pitch.
We encourage you to present with a demo if possible to win extra love!
hackathon-rules: By purchasing the tickets, you agree to MLH's Code of Conduct (https://static.mlh.io/docs/mlh-code-of-conduct.pdf).

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Esri are offering £140 in amazon vouchers for the team that best use their API!
Bloomberg are offering a bundle of prizes for a team that creates a project most aligned to their mission.
Black Pepper Software are offering battery packs for those who demonstrate passion in developing their projects.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Gibbet Hill Rd, Coventry CV4 7AL, UK

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
Your entry will be judged based on your pitch and submission on Devpost. 

There are 5 categories of awards, and two extra prizes up for grabs.
Showed outstanding creativity in concept and user experience.
Demonstrated technical prowess and potential for disrupting an industry.
Team demonstrated persistence to keep building despite facing issues along the way.
For the team with no hackathon experience who demonstrated the most enthusiasm to build and learn.
For the team that best uses Esri UK's API:

For a randomly selected person that signs up to a (free) account: 


Forward your confirmation email to
